Class TileBoxOfEternalClosure

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.tileentity.ITickableTileEntity, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProvider, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilitySerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundNBT>, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeTileEntity, net.minecraftforge.common.util.INBTSerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundNBT>, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.persist.IDirtyMarkListener, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.persist.nbt.INBTProvider, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.tileentity.CyclopsTileEntity.ITickingTile

    public class TileBoxOfEternalClosure
extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.tileentity.CyclopsTileEntity
implements org.cyclops.cyclopscore.tileentity.CyclopsTileEntity.ITickingTile
    A chest that is able to repair tools with the use of blood. Partially based on cpw's IronChests.
